mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Johnston, William F.; Harper, John to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnston, William F.; Harper, John
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling July 31 1861. By Telegraph from Pittsburgh 31 1861. John McKinsty barkeeper at Sprigg House Wheeling as he alleges is held as a spy is he true or false he is just from Frederick Md. Wm. F. Johnson John Harper 30.G.75pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Johnston, William F.; Harper, John
Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
